ai_flow.project package¶

Submodules¶

ai_flow.project.project_config module¶

class ai_flow.project.project_config.ProjectConfig[source]¶

Bases: Dict[str, str]

Configuration information of ai flow project.

get_enable_ha()[source]¶

Use ai_flow.endpoint.server.server.AIFlowServer ha mode or not. If use AIFlowServer ha return True else return False

get_list_member_interval_ms()[source]¶

If in ha mode, the ai flow client (ai_flow.client.ai_flow_client.AIFlowClient) will periodic find ai flow server(ai_flow.endpoint.server.server.AIFlowServer). This parameter represents the time interval(millisecond) between two searches for the server.

get_notification_service_uri()[source]¶

return: The notification service(notification_service.master.NotificationMaster) uri.

get_project_name()[source]¶

return: The name of an ai flow project.

get_project_uuid()[source]¶

return: The unique id of the ai flow project, it is generated by ai flow meta service.

get_retry_interval_ms()[source]¶

In ha mode, if the ai flow client (ai_flow.client.ai_flow_client.AIFlowClient) lose the ai flow server(ai_flow.endpoint.server.server.AIFlowServer), it will try to connect the server. This parameter represents the time interval(millisecond) between two trying to connect the server.

get_retry_timeout_ms()[source]¶

In ha mode, if the ai flow client (ai_flow.client.ai_flow_client.AIFlowClient) lose the ai flow server(ai_flow.endpoint.server.server.AIFlowServer), it will try to connect the server. This parameter indicates the maximum time the client attempts to connect to the server. If this time is exceeded, the client will throw an error.

get_server_ip()[source]¶

return: The ai_flow.endpoint.server.server.AIFlowServer ip.

get_server_port()[source]¶

return: The ai_flow.endpoint.server.server.AIFlowServer port.

get_server_uri()[source]¶

return: The ai_flow.endpoint.server.server.AIFlowServer uri(ip:port).

set_enable_ha(enable_ha)[source]¶
set_list_member_interval_ms(list_member_interval_ms)[source]¶
set_notification_service_uri(uri)[source]¶
set_project_name(value)[source]¶
set_project_uuid(value)[source]¶
